title: League Crashing after opening a Chest
body: Every now and then when I open a HexTech chest my Client will crash. I log back in, go to the crafting page and I didn't get anything but I lost a chest and a key. Normally I wouldn't make a big deal, but I spend money for the chests and it was lost. That's bull.

replies.body: Crashes like this can happen if you are using third party programs like play.tv.  If you have any running, remove them to get this resolved.  Hope that helps!
